issue.title: Update setup_build_env and third-party script to be more userfriendly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-68](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-68). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If curl, cmake or make are missing from the users hosts and they run source setup_build_env.sh, the script still runs to completion but doesn't actually work nor does it provide useful errors.
